column5: Level up in the lab with Ulster University’s online Biomedical Science MSc programme.  This two-year online Masters programme is aimed at professionals already working in Biomedical Science or a related healthcare discipline.  This programme is accredited by the Institute of Biomedical Science (IBMS), the leading body for those working in the field and led by a research-active team with years of hands-on experience.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
